page.title: 18CHANGING TIMES (CONT)
page.content: JOBS WITH IN THE COMMUNITY ARE NOW TO BE FOUND AT AN INDUSTRIAL ESTATE IN STRUTHERHILL.FIRMS SUCH AS DAKS_SIMPSONS (CLOTHING) EXPRESS PARSELS AND HUNTER DOUGLAS (VENETIAN BLINDS) REFLECT CHANGING TYPES OF EMPLOYMENT AND CONSUMER DEMANDS. THE PEOPLE OF LARKHALL HAVE ALWAYS BEEN KEEN ON CLUBS FOR SPARE_TIME ACTIVITES FOR EXAMPLE THE LARKHALL THISTLE CLUB,BRITISH LEGION,MINERS WELFARE ETC.CINEMA GOING WAS A POPULAR FORM OF ENTERTAINMENT IN THE 1930'S WITH THREE CINEMAS TO CHOOSE FROM_THE EMPIRE,THE GRAND CENTRAL AND THE COMMUNITY CENTER.NOW THE NEREST CINEMA IS IN HAMILTON AND OTHER EVENTS SUCH AS THEATRE OR MUSIC HALL HAVE DIED AWAY COMPLETLY.
